ygData.subject: RE: Offtopic: Come back!
ygData.msgSnippet: John Said: Heh heh.  I do try to include (meta) or (OT) in the subject lines of these things so people uninterested in them can skip them. Good Idea for
ygData.messageBody:
John Said:

Heh heh. I do try to include (meta) or (OT) in the subject
lines of these things so people uninterested in them can skip
them.

Good Idea for everyone.

There just seem to be a lot of very intelligent people on
this list who seem eager to discuss meta-game issues.
I'll start sending replies to the individual instead of the
list.

Please don't. I would miss you pithie and insightful comments. Many of these
meta and off topic dicussions are what give this list it wonderful flavor.
--
John H. Kim
kim@...
